Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers

Class GuiController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.GuiController
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionSceneController, Character10Controller, Character7Controller, CharacterInfoController, EndSceneController, GameSettingsController, NickNameRequestController, PlanningController, WaitingRoomController
public class GuiController extends Object
This class contains various common methods to allocate images and make actions.
